testimonials

My HP dv6700 laptop's nVidia GPU got fused when I played a graphic intensive game without adequate cooling resulting in problems like flickering screen and lower display resolution. Left my laptop with Sha Network for servicing and I was glad to see my laptop's GPU problem sorted out and back to supporting native resolution. I highly recommend Sha Network for their service quality and competitive prices. Abdul Azeez, Chennai
Bought a 2GB Hynix RAM from Sha Network and it turned out to have some bad memory sectors when I ran memory tests. I asked for a replacement and it was replaced by another RAM in a reasonable timeframe. These guys keep their promise. Abu Yusuf, Chennai
